name: Buku Gambar Mewarnai Kartun
description: Fitur yang terdapat dalam aplikasi ini adalah - Tampilan sederhana, mudah dipahami dan di operasikan oleh anak anak - Pengelompokan gambar menjadi beberapa kategori  - Pilihan warna beragam - Gambar Hasil mewarnai bisa di simpan di galeri - Gambar Hasil mewarnai bisa di di bagikan ke media sosial - terdapat fitur undo untuk menghapus gambar yang salah warna  Karakter Kartun yang tersedia - Angry bird - Doraemon - Frozen (Elsa, Anna dan Olaf) - Hello kitty - Kuda poni - Mickey Mouse - Minion - Pokemon - Sonic - Spongeboob - Upin-ipin The features contained in this application are - Simple display, easy to understand and operate by children - Grouping images into several categories - Various color choices - Pictures of coloring results can be saved in the gallery - Pictures of coloring results can be shared on social media - there is an undo feature to delete the wrong color image  Cartoon characters available - Angry bird - Doraemon - Frozen (Elsa, Anna and Olaf) - Hello Kitty - Pony - Mickey Mouse - Minion - Pokemon - Sonic - Spongeboob - Upin Ipin
